General.Name: Battery X Metals Inc.
General.Description: Battery X Metals Inc. focuses on the exploration and acquisition of mineral property assets, such as battery and precious metals in North America. The company holds interests in the Opatica Lithium Project located in the Quebec James Bay region. It also holds ownership of gold exploration properties located in Ontario's Red Lake Mining District. The company was formerly known as Straightup Resources Inc. and changed its name to Battery X Metals Inc. in July 2023. Battery X Metals Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
